column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////That's all we wanted after all
column2: to make sure our guests have a great time. Alison is so flexible and accommodating it was literally so easy to plan this with her behind the scenes. Also
column3: she is so sweet in person (and in email but you know
column4: email is your first point of contact!) We literally upgraded our bar package a week before the event and it wasn't even a big deal
column5: they were both just like - SURE NO PROBLEM! In fact
column6: my head count kept changing and I would just shoot her an email the week of and she would just thank me for me letting her know.
